commands.statement:
SELECT DF.DocumentNo , DF.FormID , DF.Title , DF.Period , DF.Purpose , DF.PurposeRatio , DF.Importance , DF.GoalResult , DF.Note , DF.CreatorName , DF.Tags , DF.CreatedAt FROM DocumentForm DF WHERE DF.DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DF.FormID = @FormID;
SELECT DD.DetailNo , DD.DocumentNo , DD.ExecutionWorkName , DD.ProgressRate , DD.OwenerName , DD.CategoryName , DD.Unit , DD.PeriodName1 , DD.PeriodName2 , DD.PeriodName3 , DD.PeriodName4 FROM DocumentForm DF INNER JOIN DocumentDetail DD ON DF.DocumentNo = DD.DocumentNo WHERE DD.DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DF.FormID = @FormID AND DD.DetailCategory = 'DetailItems1';

statement.if: INSERT INTO DocumentDetail ( DocumentNo , ExecutionWorkName , ProgressRate , OwenerName , CategoryName , Unit , PeriodName1 , PeriodName2 , PeriodName3 , PeriodName4 , DetailCategory , CreatedAt ) VALUES ( @DocumentNo , @ExecutionWorkName , @ProgressRate , @OwenerName , @CategoryName , @Unit , @PeriodName1 , @PeriodName2 , @PeriodName3 , @PeriodName4 , 'DetailItems1' , DATETIME('NOW', 'localtime') );

UPDATE DocumentDetail SET ExecutionWorkName = @ExecutionWorkName , ProgressRate = @ProgressRate , OwenerName = @OwenerName , CategoryName = @CategoryName , Unit = @Unit , PeriodName1 = @PeriodName1 , PeriodName2 = @PeriodName2 , PeriodName3 = @PeriodName3 , PeriodName4 = @PeriodName4 , ModifiedAt = DATETIME('NOW', 'localtime') WHERE DetailNo = @DetailNo AND DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DetailCategory = 'DetailItems1';
DELETE FROM DocumentDetail WHERE DetailNo = @DetailNo AND DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DetailCategory = 'DetailItems1';
